${ModID}:MagicWand.NAME: Magic Wand
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, add a #yStarburst into your hand.

${ModID}:StarWand.NAME: Star Wand
${ModID}:StarWand.FLAVOR: "This one is actually useful!" - Luna "Can I keep the stick?" - Primrose
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces [#aa80ff]Magic [#aa80ff]Wand. At the start of each combat, add #b3 #yStarburst into your hand.

${ModID}:AstralRose.NAME: Astral Rose
${ModID}:AstralRose.FLAVOR: Despite being cut long ago, it appears unable to wilt and is unaffected by gravity.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, #ystarlight:Project the top playable card of your draw pile.

${ModID}:BikiniArmor.NAME: Bikini Armor
${ModID}:BikiniArmor.FLAVOR: It's a mystery how this protects anyone.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, gain #b

${ModID}:CatEars.NAME: Cat Ears
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #b

${ModID}:CursedBelt.NAME: Cursed Belt
${ModID}:CursedBelt.FLAVOR: It offers great power, but you feel drained while wearing it.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, put a #rVoid on top of your draw pile. Whenever you #yExhaust a card, draw a card.

${ModID}:DramaticCloak.NAME: Dramatic Cloak
${ModID}:DramaticCloak.FLAVOR: It compels you to show off pretentiously. Dagger not included.
DESCRIPTIONS: During your first turn of combat, #yAttacks deal double damage but #yExhaust.

${ModID}:MonsterManual.NAME: Monster Manual
${ModID}:MonsterManual.FLAVOR: Describes a bizarre ritual called the Monster Mash. It seems dangerous.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever an enemy dies, draw and #yUpgrade #b

${ModID}:PureFeather.NAME: Pure Feather
${ModID}:PureFeather.FLAVOR: You feel lighter carrying this. It's like it wants to lift off on its own.
DESCRIPTIONS: #ystarlight:Project a copy of the first card you play each combat.

${ModID}:WitchPowder.NAME: Witch Powder
${ModID}:WitchPowder.FLAVOR: Not made of sugar, spire, nor anything nice.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, apply #b
